title: The best email app !!
text: Outlook stands out as the epitome of excellence in email management. Surpassing even the standard Apple Mail app, it offers unparalleled ease of navigation, efficient email flagging, marking as unread, and seamless email responses. Its intuitive user interface and streamlined user experience unequivocally establish it as the premier choice among email applications.

title: Much better!!
text: I wrote a pretty scathing review several years back and this app has come a LONG way. I don’t really have any complaints now save one - stop auto populating the ‘Signature’ with your spam. Signature should be blank by default.

title: When will the notification message preview be fixed?
text: 3-4 updates ago all of the sudden this app stopped showing message preview in notifications and just says open your app to view. I’ve checked ALL the settings and disabled and renabled notifications and it doesn’t work. Usually about 7-10 days it finally starts working in its own.
